items.title: Cow Milk Vs Plant Milk: Good For Your Health, Good For The Planet?
items.description: Only some plant-based milks provide adequate protein, calcium, and Vitamin D, but all are better for the environment than dairy milk.

items.title: Two Naked Eye Comets, ‘Harvest Moon’ And Fireballs: October’s Night Sky
items.description: October 2025 brings the full harvest moon, the Orionid meteor shower, Taurid fireballs, and perhaps a naked eye comet.
